questions.text: What was the first product Igor ever disassembled?

response.title: That's right.
response.text: Wouldn't you be amazed by a device that rewards, well, outcomes that way?

response.title: Nope
response.text: It was later, and by accident.

questions.text: As a kid, who did he want to become?

response.title: Correct!
response.text: He still sketches cars when he has free time and visits car museums around the world.

response.title: Yes! Car desiner too.
response.text: Cars are one of Igor's passions, he's always been impressed with high speed and their timeless beauty.

response.title: Fact.
response.text: He's joined hackathons since year one of college, sharpening his rapid prototyping skills early on.

response.title: Wrong!
response.text: How else would he get so good at rapid prototyping and efficient coding?

response.title: Nice try!
response.text: However, he had to open Sketch sometimes to design things that weren't well thought out. Startup vibes!

response.title: Right!
response.text: He was a React Native mobile app developer. That's where all the love for animated interpolations started...
